explanation: [0-0] A blonde boy in a pink T-shirt stands in front of a kitchen counter. He holds a red bucket of chocolate sauce in both hands, preparing to pour it into a glass jar filled with cream and colorful sprinkles. There is a metal spoon next to the glass jar. Behind him is a white refrigerator. At the top of the screen are two lines of subtitles on a white background in black: "When my parents paid for everything:".
[0-2] The boy then pours the chocolate sauce into the glass jar, opening his mouth wide as he pours. After filling the glass jar, the chocolate sauce overflows and spills onto the counter.
[0-2] The boy then pours the chocolate sauce into the glass jar, opening his mouth wide as he pours. After filling the glass jar, the chocolate sauce overflows and spills onto the counter.

[2-9] The scene switches to the living room, where a blonde girl in a black and white checkered shirt sits on a sofa. On the table in front of her is a bowl of ice cream and a spatula. A black dog stands behind her, licking her hair. The girl laughs and points at the dog. Then she struggles to take out a red bucket from the floor on the left. At this point, the girl's parents appear in the picture, the father standing on the right side of the picture and the mother on the left. They look down at the things on the table with their heads bowed. Then the girl puts down the bucket in her hand and looks at the table with wide eyes. The girl picks up a bottle of chocolate sauce, opens the lid, and nervously squeezes the chocolate sauce onto the ice cream.
